select_location_prompt: Please select a city from settings to view prayer times
counter_theme_desc: Theme changes automatically based on selected counter
theme_reset_to_counter: Theme set to match counter style
confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove
reset_to_original: has been reset to original design
all_widgets_reset: All widgets restored to original design
widget_pin_warning: If you accept, the position of app shortcuts on your home screen may change.
widget_pin_not_supported: This device does not support widget pinning
widget_specific_info: These settings apply only to the selected widget. Remove and re-add the widget for changes to take effect.
widget_klasik_desc: Classic design with warm orange tones
widget_glass_desc: Modern design with transparent glass effect
widget_neon_desc: Modern design with glowing neon effect
widget_cosmic_desc: Space theme with cosmic purple tones
widget_origami_desc: Elegant design with paper folding aesthetics
gps_detect_desc: Detect your city and district via GPS
about_desc: Huzur Vakti is a comprehensive mobile application developed to facilitate daily worship for Muslims and accurately track prayer times.
accurate_prayer_times_desc: Precise time calculations based on official religious authority data
qibla_compass_desc: Accurate Qibla direction detection based on your location
notifications_feature_desc: Audio and vibration alerts at prayer times
widgets_feature_desc: Display prayer times on your home screen
diyanet_data: Prayer time data is obtained from the Presidency of Religious Affairs.
alhamdulillah_meaning: All praise is due to Allah
la_ilaha_illallah_meaning: There is no god but Allah
la_hawla: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
la_hawla_meaning: There is no power nor strength except with Allah
prayer_desc: Fard, wajib, sunnah and how to pray
32_farz_desc: Fundamental obligations of Islam with detailed explanations
friday_prayer_desc: Conditions, how to perform and virtues
funeral_prayer_desc: How to perform, duas and rulings
tayammum_desc: When water is unavailable or cannot be used
prayer_duas_desc: Surahs, duas and their meanings recited in prayer
confirm_delete_dhikr: Are you sure you want to delete this dhikr?
location_permission_denied_forever: Location permission permanently denied. Please enable in settings.
location_service_disabled: Location service is disabled. Please enable it.
could_not_get_location: Could not get location. Please try again in an open area with GPS enabled.
last_known_location_used: Could not get live location, using last known location.
google_maps_directions: Would you like to get directions via Google Maps?
diyanet_data_note: Prayer time calculations are based on data from the Presidency of Religious Affairs.
battery_optimization_note: It is recommended to adjust battery optimization permissions for notifications to work properly.
location_permission_note: Manual city selection is required when location permission is not granted.
internet_note: Internet connection is only required during initial setup and location updates.
for_allah: Prepared for the pleasure of Allah (SWT).
notification_info: You can enable/disable notifications for each prayer time and set early reminder duration.
mute_description: Phone will be muted for 30 minutes during Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib and Isha. 60 minutes on Fridays.
save_changes_prompt: Do you want to save your changes?
dnd_permission_prompt: System permission is required to mute during prayer times. Do you want to grant permission?
dnd_not_scheduled: Could not schedule mute. Location selection required.
custom_sound_info: Important: Sound file name should not start with a number.
custom_sound_info_detail: Sound file names must start with a letter on Android system.
delete_location_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
Are you sure you want to delete this location?
lock_screen_widget_desc: Display prayer times on lock screen
lock_screen_widget_info: Creates a persistent notification showing prayer times on the lock screen. You can see the times without unlocking your phone.
lock_screen_notification_desc: Shows current and next prayer times with remaining time on the lock screen. Works even when the app is closed.
feature_multiple_locations_desc: Add multiple locations and easily switch between them
feature_country_support_desc: Preparations continue for countries outside Turkey
feature_smart_notifications_desc: Customizable notifications for each prayer time, early reminder and on-time notification options
feature_smart_alarm_desc: 14-day scheduling, stop with volume/power key, vibration only in silent mode, lock screen notification
feature_custom_notifications_desc: Separate sound for each prayer, early reminder (1-60 min before), custom sound file support
feature_auto_silent_desc: Automatically silences phone during prayer times (60min on Friday, 30min other days)
feature_imsakiye_desc: Monthly prayer timetable, instant refresh button
feature_languages_desc: Turkish, English, German, French, Arabic and Persian
feature_auto_widget_update_desc: Widget updates automatically when screen is unlocked and every minute
feature_location_based_desc: Automatically detects your location via GPS and provides the most accurate prayer times
feature_prayer_duas_desc: Subhaneke, Fatiha, Tahiyyat, Salawat and all prayer supplications with Arabic and transliteration
feature_farz_desc: All obligations of Islam with detailed explanations
feature_special_days_desc: Detailed information and reminders about holy nights, holidays and important days
feature_quran_desc: Verse of the day, surahs and easy access to Quran with translation
feature_forty_hadiths_desc: Collection of 40 selected hadiths from Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
feature_custom_dhikr_desc: Add, edit and delete your own dhikrs
feature_dhikr_counter_desc: Track your dhikrs with digital tasbih, counter and vibration feature
feature_esmaul_husna_desc: 99 beautiful names of Allah and their meanings, name of the day feature
feature_qibla_desc: Easily find Qibla direction with compass
feature_nearby_mosques_desc: View mosques within 2km radius with OpenStreetMap
feature_widgets_desc: Classic, Mini, Glassmorphism, Neon, Cosmic, Timeline, Zen, Origami - works even when app is closed
feature_themes_desc: Custom theme for each counter or choose your own colors
notification_permission_message: Permission is required to send notifications for prayer times. Would you like to grant permission?
exact_alarm_permission_message: Exact alarm permission is required to notify prayer times precisely. This permission disables battery optimization to ensure notifications work at exact times.
dnd_scheduling_failed: Could not schedule Do Not Disturb. Location selection required.
custom_sound_warning: Custom sound files may not play if they are not available on your device. Default sounds work more reliably.
live_location_unavailable: Live location unavailable, using last known location.
widget_info: These settings apply to all widget types. Remove and re-add widgets to see changes.
widget_unsaved_changes_message: Do you want to save changes made to {widget}?
notification_permission_message: Permission is required to send prayer time notifications.
exact_alarm_permission_message: Exact alarm permission is required to notify at exact prayer times.
notification_info_text:
• You can enable/disable notifications for each prayer
• Set early reminder time
• Set audio alarm with "Notify at time"
custom_sound_warning:
Important: Sound file name should not start with a number.

On Android, sound file names must start with a letter.
select_city_first: Select a city to view prayer times
vibration_note_1: 1. Press each button and feel the vibration
vibration_note_2: 2. Phone might be on silent (check it)
vibration_note_3: 3. Device vibration settings must be on
vibration_note_4: 4. If none work, it might be a device issue
lock_screen_error: Could not start lock screen notification
splash_subtitle: Reach the peace of prayer times
onboarding_skip_confirm_message: You can grant incomplete permissions later from app settings.
notification_permission_denied: Notification permission denied. Notifications will not work.
dnd_permission_message: System permission is required to mute during prayer times. Would you like to grant permission?
save_changes_message: Would you like to save your changes?
dnd_scheduling_failed: Could not schedule mute. Location selection required.
mute_during_prayer_desc: Mutes 1 min after alarm. Friday prayer 60 min, other times 30 min. Shows notification with Exit/Stay buttons.
imsak_desc: Time to wake up for Suhoor
alarm_enabled_desc: You will receive audio alerts even on lock screen
alarm_disabled_desc: Alarm will sound on lock screen when enabled
counter_settings_desc: Select the prayer counter to display on the home screen. Swipe to preview other counters.
counter_kristal_desc: Glass and crystal effect elegant design
counter_volkanik_desc: Fire and lava effect energetic design
counter_gece_desc: Moon and stars night sky design
counter_matrix_desc: Matrix movie style falling code effect hacker design
counter_nefes_desc: Meditation and breathing exercise themed calming design
counter_tesla_desc: Electric energy themed dynamic lightning effect design
counter_islami_desc: Crescent, star and Islamic geometric patterns traditional design
hijri_new_year_desc: May your new Hijri year be blessed

verses.text: Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
He is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
Remember Allah much that you may be successful.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
Whoever puts his trust in Allah, He will be enough for him.
Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
Establish prayer and give zakah.
Allah loves those who are patient.
My mercy encompasses all things.
He is very kind to His servants.
My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer.
To Him ascends good speech.
When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest...
Say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
If you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.
Allah intends for you ease.
Indeed, Allah orders justice.
The servants of the Most Merciful walk upon the earth with humility.
Whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
Obey Allah and His Messenger.
We have not sent you except as a mercy to the worlds.
Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Is the reward for good anything but good?
Fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.
Every soul will taste death.
Worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty.
He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate.

prayers.text: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers.
O Turner of hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion.
My Lord, expand my chest and ease my task for me.
O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, pure provision, and accepted deeds.
My Lord, enable me to be grateful.
O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.
My Lord, do not leave me alone, and You are the best of inheritors.
O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
My Lord, join me with the righteous.
O Allah, rectify my heart and my deeds.
My Lord, treat me with Your mercy.
O Allah, grant me well-being in my religion, my worldly life, and my Hereafter.
My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity, laziness, and cowardice.
My Lord, make me and my descendants establishers of prayer.
O Allah, forgive my sins and expand my provision.
Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the Fire.
O Allah, help me in doing good deeds.
My Lord, cause me to die as a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
O Allah, I ask You for health and well-being.
My Lord, protect me from evil.
O Allah, increase the blessings in what is good for me.
Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him.
O Allah, You are my Lord; there is no deity except You.
My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils.
O Allah, make my condition the best it can be.
My Lord, grant me patience and let me die as a Muslim.
O Allah, You are the source of peace, and from You comes peace.
My Lord, who forgives sins except You?
O Allah, let my life end in goodness.

hadiths.text: Actions are judged by intentions, and everyone will get what they intended.
A Muslim is one from whose tongue and hand other Muslims are safe.
Make things easy and do not make them difficult. Give glad tidings and do not repel people.
The best among you are those who have the best character.
A good word is charity.
Paradise lies at the feet of mothers.
None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
Cleanliness is half of faith.
A strong believer is better than a weak believer.
Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should not harm his neighbor.
Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent.
This world is a farm for the Hereafter.
Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim.
Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
Wisdom is the lost property of the believer; wherever he finds it, he should take it.
The best of people are those who are most beneficial to others.
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
An hour of contemplation is better than a year of worship.
A cheerful face is charity.
When you are angry, be silent.
Removing harmful things from the road is an act of faith.
Every good deed is charity.
There are two blessings that many people are deceived about: health and free time.
Take advantage of five before five: your life before death...
Allah helps the servant as long as the servant helps his brother.
Prayer is the pillar of religion.
Prayer is the ascension of the believer.
The best jihad is speaking a word of truth before a tyrannical ruler.
If you feel no shame, then do as you wish.
Piety (avoiding doubtful matters) is the foundation of religion.
